func.name: AddItem
func.desc: Add a new item to NPC shop

param.name: NPC id
param.desc: The NPC ID to who's shop to add current item

param.name: Shop
param.desc: If the NPC has multiple shops then each shop has its id starting from 0. Default is 0. Reference to AddPopup();

func.name: AddDialog
func.desc: Add a new dialogue to the NPC (opens when clicked on 'Talk To')

param.name: NPC id
param.desc: The NPC ID to whom to add this dialogue

param.name: Page
param.desc: The page number of the current npc's dialogue. Default 1

param.name: Unknown
param.desc: Can be the size of the dialog. Or the template window to use.

param.name: Text
param.desc: The message to add to this dialogue

func.name: AddPopup
func.desc: Add a new menu item to the NPC's menu when clicking on it in game

param.name: NPC id
param.desc: The NPC ID to whom to add this popup

param.name: Command
param.desc: The type of the popup. What happens if its clicked. 0x2710 means to open the dialogue, 0x191 means to open a shop.

param.name: Params
param.desc: Subtype of the popup. If type is dialogue then this should be 0, if its a shop then the kind of the shop(0x3E akkan armor)

param.name: Text
param.desc: Text to show in the menu

param.name: Class
param.desc: Class who can see this option. 1-fighter, 2-rogue, 4-mage, 8-acolyte, 0x10000-combatant, 0x20000-officiator, 0xFF0FFF-everyone

func.name: AddQuest
func.desc: Add a quest starting point to a NPC

param.name: NPC id
param.desc: The NPC ID to whom to add this quest

func.name: AddQuestWords
func.desc: Add green message to NPC head if the quest is available

param.name: NPC id
param.desc: The NPC ID to whom to add this message

param.name: Quest
param.desc: The quest ID. If the quest comes avalable to the player the text is shown

func.name: AddWords
func.desc: Add a message to NPC which is displayed in chat

param.name: NPC id
param.desc: The NPC ID to whom to add this message

func.name: AddZoneMove
func.desc: Set the target position of a zone teleport to a NPC

param.name: NPC id
param.desc: The NPC ID to set on this position

param.name: Zone
param.desc: Zone ID where the player is moved to

param.name: X
param.desc: X cordinate (e.g. from the left side of the map)

param.name: Z
param.desc: Z cordinate (e.g. from the bottom of the map)

func.name: SetDropBase
func.desc: Set the drop base of random EQ shop

param.name: NPC id
param.desc: The NPC ID to who's shop it apply's

param.name: Unknown
param.desc: Seems to be something's id (have seen 0 or 1)

func.name: SetDropGrade
func.desc: Set the drop grade(chance) of random EQ shop

param.name: NPC id
param.desc: The NPC ID to who's shop it apply's

param.name: Unknown
param.desc: Seems to be something's id (have seen 0 or 1)

func.name: SetNPC
func.desc: Add a new NPC

param.name: Zone
param.desc: Zone ID where to add it

param.name: Unknown
param.desc: Seems to be always the same 0x10000001

func.name: SetPosition
func.desc: Set the position of a NPC

param.name: NPC id
param.desc: The NPC ID to set on this position

param.name: Dir
param.desc: Direction of the NPC where he is facing

param.name: X
param.desc: X cordinate (e.g. from the left side of the map)

param.name: Z
param.desc: Z cordinate (e.g. from the bottom of the map)

func.name: SetNPCAttribute
func.desc: Set attributes of the NPC

param.name: NPC id
param.desc: The NPC ID to whom to apply these attributes

param.name: Type
param.desc: NPC type / How is it showed on the mini map (0xB-weapon, 0x13-vault, 0x10 Trainer)

func.name: QuestStart
func.desc: Quest start tag

param.name: Quest ID
param.desc: Unique ID of the quest. Starting with a F means that this quest can't be deleted

param.name: Min lvl
param.desc: The minimum level the player has to be to do the quest

param.name: Max lvl
param.desc: The maximum level the player can be to do the quest

param.name: Class
param.desc: 0x000FFF - Humans, 0xFF0000 - Akkans, 0xFF0FFF - all; 10 defender, 20 warrior, 40 sin, 80 arch, 100 sourc, 200 ench, 400 priest, 800 cleric. Akkans are 0x1...

param.name: Existsing quest
param.desc: The ID of the quest the player has to have to do the quest

func.name: QuestEnd
func.desc: Quest End tag

func.name: QuestSkillPointBonus
func.desc: Gives the player Skillpoints

param.name: amount
param.desc: Number of Skillpoints to add to the player

func.name: QuestType
func.desc: Specifies the quest type

param.name: Quest Type
param.desc: Talk to npc=0, Use a item=1, Go to some area=2

func.name: QuestTitle
func.desc: Quest title, has to be within 11 chars

func.name: QuestDesc
func.desc: Conversation message when NPC asks for a quest

param.name: Text
param.desc: Conversation message when NPC asks for a quest

func.name: QuestShortDesc
func.desc: Summary of Quest objectives

func.name: QuestIcon
func.desc: Icon registered on quest window when a quest has been received

func.name: QuestCompleteSave
func.desc: Weather the quest should be saved or no (on completed quests list)

func.name: QuestLevel
func.desc: Degree of difficulty of quest

func.name: QuestAward
func.desc: Quest reward description

param.name: Reward text
param.desc: Example: - Experience 520\\- Gold 4,800\\- C Grade Item (Random)

func.name: AddPhase
func.desc: Addition of Phase(Zone Number, Page Number, Summary of Phase)

param.name: Phase #
param.desc: Phase number, every phase in the same quest has it's own.

func.name: Phase_Target
func.desc: Mark the location of hint for current phase on entire map (X coordinate, Y coordinate)

func.name: Trigger_Start
func.desc: Trigger entered when begining a quest

func.name: Trigger_Puton
func.desc: Trigger generating an event when an item is positioned at the relevent location (Item ID, Zone ID, x, y, z, Zone Size)

func.name: Trigger_Geton
func.desc: Triggers when dashing into the relevent coordinate system (Item ID, Zone ID, x, y, z, Zone Size)

func.name: Trigger_Talk
func.desc: Triggered when talking with the relevant NPC (NPC ID)

func.name: Trigger_Kill
func.desc: Triggered when certain number of relevent monster has been killed (Number to be killed, Monster ID)

func.name: Trigger_Pick
func.desc: Triggers when specified number of items are placed into Inventory (Quantity, Item ID)

func.name: Trigger_Fame
func.desc: Triggered when fame has been collected until sepcific fame amount (Fame)

func.name: Trigger_LevelTalk
func.desc: Triggered when talking to the NPC at a relevent level (Level, NPC ID, ElseMsg)

func.name: Else
func.desc: When the player hasn't meet all the requirements (event_disappear,trigger_talk,..)

func.name: Event_Disappear
func.desc: Hides the corresponding item (Quantity, Item ID, Gold)

func.name: Event_Get
func.desc: Give relevent Item to a player character(Quantity, Item ID)

func.name: Event_Spawn
func.desc: Spawn relevent Monster (Monster ID, x,y,z)

func.name: Event_MonsterDrop
func.desc: Monster drops relevent Item and Quantity (Item ID, Quantity)

func.name: Event_Award
func.desc: quest reward (Experience, Gold, Fame, Medal)

func.name: Event_MsgBox
func.desc: Call message box (Message content is forced to begin a new line by '\\')

func.name: Event_Phase
func.desc: Skip to relevent phase number(Phase number)

func.name: Event_End
func.desc: End of event, Completed without moving to a phase. Removes from active quest window.

func.name: Event_AwardItem
func.desc: Reward Graded Item(Item type, LV of PC, Item Grade) ??Item type to suit class of 0 = PC ??Level to suit level of 0=PC

func.name: Event_AddQuest
func.desc: Force relevent quest to be registered (NPC ID giving quest, Quest ID forced to be registsred) ??0xFxxx is a quest that can not be cancelled

func.name: Event_Move
func.desc: Move to X,Y coordinate of concerened zone (Zone, X, Y)

func.name: Event_TheaterMode
func.desc: Turn on Theater Mode

func.name: AddString
func.desc: Adds a string to the game with the specific ID

param.name: ID
param.desc: Specifies the id of the text

func.name: AddString
func.desc: Adds a string to the game

func.name: RylNation
func.desc: Specifies the game nation

param.desc: The NPC ID to who's shop to add current item
